title: U.S. Economy, 2020 & USMCA
itunes:title: U.S. Economy, 2020 & USMCA
description:
Kevin spoke with Marc Ross, founder of Caracal Global and Louise Schiavone, Journalist and Senior Lecturer at Johns Hopkins University Carey Business School.

They discussed Trump's comments on the economy, 2020 elections, USMCA, NATO and climate change.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
